;Reply  Letter

;

;Comrades from Khunjerab Customs:

;

;Hello! Letter received. You overcame difficulties such as extreme cold and hypoxia, and took root at the frontline of the country in the snowy frontier. You were loyal to your duties and dedicated silently, creating extraordinary achievements and demonstrating the enterprising spirit of customs personnel in the new era. This year marks the 20th anniversary of the implementation of the customs ranking system. I would like to take this opportunity to extend my sincere greetings to all comrades in the customs system!

;

;The customs is responsible for guarding the country and promoting development, and it is of great significance to do a good job in customs work. I hope that comrades will have the "greatest power of the country" in mind, carry forward the fine style of the customs team, improve supervision efficiency and service levels, build a solid security barrier for the country, promote high-quality development and high-level opening up, and do a good job to reassure the party and satisfy the people. Guardians of the country, actively contributing to the construction of a strong country and national rejuvenation.

;

;Xi Jinping    

;

;September 11, 2023  

;

;(Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, September 12)  

;

; 

;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, September 12. Xi Jinping, General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the State, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission, issued a letter to all Khunjerab Customs on September 11. The official responded to the letter and expressed his high expectations for the cadres and employees of the customs system to better perform their duties and missions.

;

;Xi Jinping said in his reply that you have overcome difficulties such as high cold and hypoxia, and have taken root on the frontline of the country in the snowy frontier. You have been loyal to your duties and devoted yourself silently, creating extraordinary achievements and demonstrating the hard work and determination of customs personnel in the new era. For the spiritual outlook. This year marks the 20th anniversary of the implementation of the customs ranking system. I would like to take this opportunity to extend my sincere greetings to all comrades in the customs system!

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that the customs has the responsibility and mission of guarding the country and promoting development, and it is of great significance to do a good job in customs work. I hope that comrades will have the "greatest power of the country" in mind, carry forward the fine style of the customs team, improve supervision efficiency and service levels, build a solid security barrier for the country, promote high-quality development and high-level opening up, and do a good job to reassure the party and satisfy the people. Guardians of the country, actively contributing to the construction of a strong country and national rejuvenation. (The full text of the reply will be sent separately)

;

;The Khunjerab Customs is located in the Pamir Plateau, known as the "life forbidden area". The port where it is located is the only land entry and exit channel between my country and Pakistan. In 2005, Khunjerab Customs was awarded the honorary title of "Hard-working Model Customs" by the State Council. This year, it was named an advanced collective in the national customs system. On the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the implementation of the customs ranking system, all Khunjerab Customs officers wrote a letter to General Secretary Xi Jinping, reporting on the situation of continuing to guard the country's gates and service development, and expressing their determination to contribute to the promotion of Chinese-style modernization.

; Wed, 13 Sep 2023 06:26:05 +0800 01版要闻 - “还是要怀平常心，把握住自己的历史定位”（微观察）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/13/nw.D110000renmrb_20230913_3-01.htm
;Wednesday, September 13, 2023
; ;

;Confidence and normalcy are a set of dialectical relationships. General Secretary Xi Jinping thinks in practice.

;

;This symposium on promoting the comprehensive revitalization of Northeast China in the new era is not only an outline of the revitalization of Northeast China, but also a window for observing China's development. When talking about overcoming difficulties, the General Secretary said with emotion: "Confidence is worth gold. As long as you have confidence, you can expect a bright future. In the new journey of building a strong country and rejuvenating the nation, Northeast China will surely be able to regain its glory, Let’s achieve great results again.”

;

;“Of course we should not blindly pursue miracles, but we should keep a normal mind and grasp our own historical position. Don’t make extreme or emotional actions. Seeking medical treatment in a hurry. Those practices are of no benefit."

;

;A normal mind is a calm and firm confidence.

;

;“When the Party Central Committee looks at problems, it always looks at the big picture, and what is the most important mission of a place.” This passage from the General Secretary is an entry point for understanding China.

;

;Be able to recognize opportunities and advantages more clearly in your ordinary mind. Only by judging the opportunities and advantages of a place can we better grasp the strategic positioning and historical mission of a place. From this perspective, we can have a deeper understanding of why in Northeast China we talk about "firmly grasping the important mission of Northeast China in safeguarding the country's 'five major security'"; why in Xinjiang, the General Secretary proposed that "if the Silk Road Economic Belt is built, Xinjiang will "It may become a prosperous center"; why go to Sichuan, focus on the construction of the country's "rear area", and hope that "this place will become a growth pole and a new source of power for high-quality development"...

;

;New In this era, the common opportunities and responsibilities and missions faced by all provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities are to build a strong country and rejuvenate the nation. Their respective advantages are advantages in the overall situation, advantages in opportunities, and advantages in comparison.

;

;While inspecting Heilongjiang, General Secretary Xi Jinping heard someone talk about an incident: a young man was fishing leisurely by the river. When asked, he came to plant crops and was responsible for drone operations, which was completed that day.

;

;In the past, when we were opening up wasteland, "we would get up at 3:30 in the morning and come back to see the sky full of stars, gnawing on frozen steamed buns and eating snowflake soup." Nowadays, the scientific and technological quality of the farmland is sufficient, and the agricultural modernization of Northeast China is at the forefront of the country.

;

;This is the advantage of Northeast China. With white mountains and black waters, there is vast space for agricultural modernization to show its talents. After seeing the advantages and comparing the overall situation, a normal mind will come naturally.

;

;Consider a domain from the overall perspective and use one domain to serve the overall situation. General Secretary Xi Jinping visited the southeastern coast and emphasized many times that "economically large provinces must be brave enough to take the lead." This is the mission of a large economic province to serve the overall situation. During his trip to Heilongjiang this time, the General Secretary urged "strengthening the strategic supporting role of Northeast China." This is the responsibility and mission of Northeast China in the modernization process.

;

;Find the correct positioning and anchor the positioning, so that you will not belittle yourself and have confidence; you will not be arrogant and you will be more clear-headed. General Secretary Xi Jinping has thought deeply about the role of Northeast China in food security: "Ensure that production and supply are sufficient in normal times, and that it can withstand and be reliable in extreme circumstances. This is an overall thinking. Continue to be China's northern warehouse, and grow The triangle area is the center of China's cutting-edge science and technology, which is equally glorious and equally important."

;

;A normal mind also means patience and determination.

;

;This year I went to Pingjiang Road in Suzhou and watched the flying needles of Suzhou embroidery. General Secretary Xi Jinping sighed with emotion: "The resilience, patience and determination of the Chinese people are part of the Chinese national spirit."

;< P>;This resilience, patience and determination are also the key to the Chinese nation's continued survival for thousands of years in the face of complex difficulties and challenges.

;

;Our understanding of time is “not in terms of ten years or hundreds of years, but in terms of hundreds or thousands of years.” This is the strategic depth of China's development, and it is also the basis for our "keeping a normal mind".

;

;In today's China, the Central Committee of the Party is at the forefront, and the whole country is united. However, it is inevitable that the pace will be a bit hasty in some places. General Secretary Xi Jinping has earnestly urged this.

;

;When talking about "accelerating the construction of a modern industrial system with Northeastern characteristics and advantages" at this symposium, the general secretary said: "This speed is also a theory of relativity, and modernization cannot violate the law."

;

;Only when you have a normal mind can you have concentration. Only when you have concentration and wisdom can you better create methods and plan ideas.

;

;The high winds, strong waves, and dangerous reefs on the Fuxing Road have not been interrupted in recent years. Faced with "decoupling and breaking links", China has responded effectively. General Secretary Xi Jinping proposed a new development pattern of "dual circulation", which was the result of thinking and planning during grassroots research in the spring of 2020.

;

;“After the epidemic prevention and control has stabilized, economic recovery will be a process of wave-like development and tortuous progress.” At the Political Bureau meeting of the CPC Central Committee in July this year, General Secretary Xi Jinping said these words, What is demonstrated is the strategic determination of "still calmly flying through the chaotic clouds".

;

;A normal mind is a kind of strategic clarity and strategic determination that is not confused by temporary adversity and understands the essence of things. The development of history has its inevitability and its regularity. There are twists and turns in the progress, and we move forward in twists and turns, "sometimes through dust, sometimes through mud, sometimes across swamps, sometimes through jungles."

;

;I usually have the enterprising spirit of "always worrying".

;

;At this symposium, when talking about achievements, the first thing to affirm is food; when making demands, the first thing to say is that "it is the primary responsibility of Northeast China to be the 'ballast stone' for the country's stable food production and supply."

;

;This is General Secretary Xi Jinping’s tenth visit to Northeast China after the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China. Every time he comes, he talks about food security. Take the protection of black soil as an example:

;

;In 2018 in Heilongjiang, the General Secretary proposed to “ensure that black soil is not reduced or degraded.” During the Jilin inspection in 2020, the black soil was described as the "giant panda in the cultivated land" and required to be protected and utilized well. At the end of this year, the Central Rural Work Conference emphasized that "the protection of black soil should be regarded as a major matter." Later, on August 1, 2022, my country’s Black Land Protection Law was officially implemented.

;

;I feel uneasy all the time.

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping has repeatedly mentioned the "nail-driving spirit" and quoted the ancient adage "one small step can lead to a thousand miles". Times always move forward by constantly solving problems. Chinese-style modernization is walking on a road that has never been walked by predecessors. "Stick to the goal and never relax, dare to venture, dare to work hard, and work hard."

;

;From prosperity to decline, and then to the Rejuvenation is now on a new journey of building a strong country and rejuvenating the nation. To accomplish extraordinary things, you must have extraordinary spirit and extraordinary actions.

;

;“I believe in action.”

;

;In 2011, when he visited a university in Guizhou, Comrade Xi Jinping talked about “cultivate oneself, manage one’s family, govern the country, and bring peace to the world” in “The University”. Some insights:

;

;"Life will face different situations, clouds will roll and the clouds will relax, flowers will bloom and fall. The most important thing is to face them with a normal mind, think independently, and practice internally and externally."

;

;We usually have confidence and responsibility in our hearts. This is true for a person and also for a country.

; Wed, 13 Sep 2023 06:26:05 +0800 01版要闻 - 中共中央国务院关于支持福建探索海峡两岸融合发展新路 建设两岸融合发展示范区的意见http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/13/nw.D110000renmrb_20230913_6-01.htm
;Wednesday, September 13, 2023
; ;

;Solving the Taiwan issue and realizing the complete reunification of the motherland are the unswerving historical tasks of the Communist Party of China and the common goal of all Chinese people. Aspiration is an inevitable requirement for realizing the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation. Fujian has a unique position and role in the overall work on Taiwan. In order to deepen the integrated development of various fields across the Taiwan Strait and promote the process of peaceful reunification of the motherland, the following opinions are hereby offered to support Fujian in exploring new paths for cross-Strait integrated development and building a cross-Strait integrated development demonstration zone.

;

;;1. Overall Requirements;

;

; Guided by Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, thoroughly implement the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Party and persist in implementing the new era The party's overall strategy for solving the Taiwan issue implements the concept of "both sides of the Taiwan Strait are one family", highlights the promotion of integration through communication, benefits and affection, and strives to build a demonstration zone for cross-Strait integrated development in Fujian.

;

;Give full play to Fujian’s unique advantages and pioneering role in Taiwan, make good use of resources from all parties, and deepen integrated development; always respect, care for, and benefit Taiwan compatriots, and improve policies and systems that enhance the well-being of Taiwan compatriots and enjoy equal treatment. ; Adhere to a problem-oriented approach, highlight pioneering and piloting, expand authorization and empowerment, and continue to promote policy and institutional innovation; adhere to the principle of first easy and then difficult, step-by-step, continuous advancement, long-term success, adapt to the times and local conditions, and support regions with good conditions and outstanding advantages to take the lead. Pilot projects and point-to-point initiatives will guide other regions to find their correct positioning and achieve synergy.

;

;Working goals. The Cross-Strait Integrated Development Demonstration Zone has been basically completed, and Fujian's effect as the first home for Taiwanese compatriots and Taiwanese companies has been fully demonstrated. The policy and institutional system for integrated development has become more complete, and the social atmosphere of "cross-Straits is one family, and Fujian and Taiwan are close relatives" has become stronger; personnel exchanges between Fujian and Taiwan have become more convenient, trade and investment have become smoother, and exchanges and cooperation have expanded to wider areas and deeper levels; Xiamen The demonstration effect of integrated development with Kinmen, Fuzhou and Matsu continues to emerge, and the Pingtan Comprehensive Experimental Zone fully exerts its role in integrating Taiwan.

;

;;2. Build the first home for Taiwan compatriots and Taiwanese enterprises to land;

;

;(1) Smooth the channels for Taiwan compatriots to travel. Carry out the construction of transportation and logistics infrastructure appropriately in advance, and increase the guarantee of funds and other factors. Promote that the infrastructure in Fujian and Taiwan should be fully connected, build a three-dimensional comprehensive channel hub for Taiwan, and smooth the connection between Fujian and Taiwan and other parts of the mainland. Strengthen the layout and construction of major logistics infrastructure such as logistics hubs, and improve the regional logistics distribution system. Further optimize and intensify the passenger and freight routes along the coast of Fujian and the main island of Taiwan, as well as Kinmen and Matsu. Create a more relaxed policy environment for compatriots on both sides of the Taiwan Strait to travel between Fujian and Taiwan and for Taiwan compatriots to stay and reside in Fujian. Encourage more Taiwanese compatriots who have never been to the mainland to come to Fujian for visits and exchanges.

;

;(2) Promote Taiwanese students to come to Fujian to study and study. The policy of “welcoming, treating all students equally, and enrolling in schools nearby” is implemented for the children of Taiwanese compatriots studying in Fujian primary and secondary schools and public kindergartens. Support Fujian universities and research institutes to expand their recruitment of Taiwanese students through various methods. Support universities on both sides of the Taiwan Strait to carry out high-level cooperative education and diversified cooperation in Fujian, and support Taiwan's advantageous and characteristic industry enterprises to participate in joint-stock and mixed vocational school running in Fujian in various forms. Establish a number of cross-Strait youth study bases.

;

;(3) Encourage Taiwan compatriots to come to Fujian for employment. Support various enterprises in Fujian, especially Taiwanese enterprises, in hiring more Taiwanese employees. Increase efforts to recruit Taiwanese teachers in Fujian vocational schools. Further expand the scope of direct recognition of Taiwanese professional qualifications. Taiwanese doctors practice medicine in Fujian according to regulations. Gradually expand the scope of practice for Taiwan residents who have obtained national legal professional qualifications to engage in the legal profession in Fujian. Vigorously develop diversified human resources service agencies, including Taiwan-funded agencies.

;

;(4) Expand Taiwan compatriots’ social participation. Support Taiwan compatriots to participate in the development of various undertakings such as ecological environmental protection, rural revitalization, and social welfare in Fujian. Support Taiwan compatriots to deeply participate in practical activities such as local community construction and grassroots governance in Fujian. Support Taiwan compatriots to join relevant industry, academic, and professional social groups. Launch a pilot program for Taiwan compatriots to serve as leaders and legal representatives of non-religious social organizations in Fujian. Support Taiwan compatriots to participate in evaluations for honors and awards at all levels in accordance with relevant national regulations. Taiwan compatriots are encouraged to serve as arbitrators, mediators, people's assessors, people's supervisors, prosecutorial liaison officers and judicial auxiliary personnel, etc., to participate in the construction of the rule of law in Fujian.

;

;(5) Facilitate the life of Taiwanese compatriots in Fujian. Cancel the temporary residence registration of Taiwanese compatriots in Fujian. Taiwan compatriots are encouraged to apply for a Taiwan Resident Residence Permit. Taiwanese compatriots settled in Fujian and realized their wish to settle down. Expand the application scope of identity verification of Taiwan residents’ residence certificates, and strive to achieve the same convenience in social application of Taiwan residents’ residence certificates and mainland residents’ identity cards. Encourage Taiwanese compatriots to buy houses in Fujian. Improve institutional guarantees for Taiwan compatriots in Fujian such as employment, medical treatment, housing, elderly care services, and social assistance, and include Taiwan compatriots in Fujian into the mainland's social security system in accordance with laws and regulations.

;

;(6) Improve Taiwan-related judicial services. Create an open resource sharing platform that integrates Taiwan-related legal research and consultation and legal ascertainment in Taiwan. Strengthen exchanges and cooperation between cross-strait arbitration institutions, and allow Taiwanese civil and commercial arbitration institutions to set up business offices in Xiamen to carry out Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan-related and foreign-related arbitration services. Create a preferred location for mainland Taiwan-related judicial services and provide legal protection for Taiwan compatriots and Taiwanese enterprises to participate in cross-strait integrated development. Continue to optimize Taiwan-related law enforcement, prosecution, trial, enforcement supervision and other mechanisms, and continuously improve Taiwan-related legal services.

;

;;3. Promote the in-depth integration of Fujian and Taiwan’s economy and trade;

;

;(7) Optimize the Taiwan-related business environment. Support Fujian Province in creating a world-class business environment, and guide Taiwanese compatriots and Taiwanese enterprises to jointly build a market-oriented, legal and convenient business environment. Opinions on formulating special measures to promote the integration of Fujian and Taiwan and relax market access. Encourage the Fujian Pilot Free Trade Zone to expand to Taiwan on a first-come-first-served basis. Support the innovative development of small-amount trade with Taiwan. Build a cross-Strait standards common service platform, encourage cross-Strait industry, academia, and research enterprises to jointly formulate common industry standards, and explore the establishment of a qualification assessment and certification system for Taiwanese enterprises. Improve the coordination and linkage mechanism for protecting the rights and interests of Taiwan compatriots and Taiwanese enterprises, establish and improve government-enterprise communication channels, and promote the increase and quality improvement of Taiwanese businesses in Fujian and Taiwan.

;

;(8) Deepen industrial cooperation. We will support regions with the necessary conditions to build demonstration bases for new industrialized industries, strengthen industrial cooperation between Fujian and Taiwan, and improve the resilience and safety of cross-strait industrial and supply chains. Strengthen factor guarantees and support Gulei Petrochemical Industrial Base and Ningde Power Battery Cluster in building globally competitive industrial bases and advanced manufacturing clusters that gather resource factors from both sides of the Taiwan Strait. Support Fujian enterprises and Taiwanese enterprises in Fujian to jointly build enterprise cooperation alliances. Support the construction of multi-level cross-Strait financial markets, innovate cross-Strait social capital cooperation methods, promote the establishment of cross-Strait industrial integration development funds, support the innovation and upgrading of the "Taiwan-owned Board" of the Straits Equity Exchange Center, strengthen cooperation and docking with the New Third Board, and promote more qualified companies in the High-quality Taiwanese companies from Fujian are listed on the mainland, encouraging more Taiwanese companies to participate in the development of the mainland's financial market. Support cross-Strait cooperation in the fashion and creative industries and jointly cultivate brands with national characteristics.

;

;(9) Promote the development of Taiwan’s agriculture, fishery and small and medium-sized enterprises in Fujian. Encourage Taiwanese farmers and fishermen to participate in the integrated development of primary, secondary and tertiary industries in rural Fujian and participate in rural revitalization. It will continue to benefit Taiwan’s farmers and fishermen and provide more convenience in terms of land use, financing, and opening up the domestic market. Deepen the cooperative development of tourism resources between Fujian and Taiwan, and support Taiwanese businesses in participating in the quality and upgrading of rural tourism in Fujian. Increase support for the construction of Taiwanese farmers' entrepreneurial parks, carry out exchanges and cooperation in marine economy and other fields, support the creation of national rural revitalization demonstration counties in areas where Taiwanese enterprises and farmers gather, and build cross-strait rural revitalization cooperation bases and national high-quality platforms for modern agriculture and fishery. Attract Taiwanese businesses to come to Fujian to engage in e-commerce, health care, logistics, catering and other service industries. Support qualified mainland and Taiwanese enterprises to apply for Chinese time-honored brands. Encourage Taiwanese small and medium-sized enterprises to develop in Fujian, and support Fujian in establishing a cross-strait small and medium-sized enterprise cooperation zone. Promote cross-strait cooperation in future industrial development. Explore new forms of cross-Strait service trade cooperation and development.

;

;(10) Strengthen cooperation in scientific and technological innovation. Encourage Fujian and Taiwan enterprises and scientific research institutions to jointly build common technology research and development platforms and promote digital, networked and intelligent transformation of enterprises in Fujian and Taiwan. Support Fuzhou and Xiamen in building a Fujian and Taiwan talent gathering platform with distinctive characteristics, complementary advantages, and coordinated development. Create a platform for the transformation of ecological and environmental scientific and technological achievements across the Taiwan Strait to support Taiwan compatriots and Taiwanese enterprises in participating in green economic development.

;

;;4. Promote integrated development in Fujian;

;

;(11) Support Xiamen and Kinmen to accelerate integrated development. Support Xiamen in carrying out comprehensive reform pilots, and grant Xiamen greater autonomy in reforming key areas and key links through list and batch authorization. We will implement that Kinmen residents enjoy the same treatment as local residents in Xiamen, take the lead in promoting equalization, universal benefit and convenience of basic public services, create a "same-city living circle" between Xiamen and Kinmen, and deepen inter-school exchanges and cooperation between Xiamen University and Kinmen University. Explore the model of cooperation between Xiamen and Kinmen in building infrastructure, accelerate the advancement of electricity, gas and bridge connections with Kinmen, and support Kinmen in sharing Xiamen’s new airport.

;

;(12) Support Fuzhou and Matsu to deepen their integrated development. Create a "city living circle" in Fuma and support Matsu residents to enjoy the same treatment as local residents in Fuzhou. Establish Fuzhou Matsu Industrial Cooperation Park to promote the innovative integration of Fuzhou and Matsu in the fields of cultural tourism, marine fisheries and other fields, and attract Taiwanese compatriots and Taiwanese enterprises to participate in the development of Fuzhou's digital economy. Promote water, electricity, ventilation and bridge connections between Fuzhou and Matsu. Support Fuzhou New District and Pingtan Comprehensive Experimental Zone in establishing an integration and coordination mechanism with Taiwan to achieve integrated and high-quality development.

;

;(13) Accelerate the opening and development of Pingtan Comprehensive Experimental Zone. Support the Pingtan Comprehensive Experimental Zone in accelerating the establishment of an all-round opening to Taiwan. Gradually build a policy system for the liberalization and facilitation of investment and trade with Taiwan, expand the opening of cross-border service trade with Taiwan, and explore the construction of a pioneer area for the cross-strait common market. Support the Pingtan Comprehensive Experimental Zone in building a more convenient cross-strait channel. Study the liberalization of access to Taiwan’s information services and other industries, and study and explore related measures to accelerate the opening up of education.

;

;(14) Promote integration practices in other areas of Fujian. Give full play to the advantages of the main ancestral places of Taiwanese compatriots in the Hokkien-speaking areas of Quanzhou and Zhangzhou, build a world cultural exchange center for Hokkien, and carry out integrated development practices with Penghu. Support Longyan and Sanming in leveraging their Hakka ancestral advantages and innovating cross-strait Hakka cultural exchanges. Support Sanming in building a cross-strait rural integrated development pilot zone. Support Putian to use the hometown of Mazu and the Cross-Strait Biotechnology and Medical Health Industry Cooperation Zone as carriers to deepen exchanges and cooperation with Taiwan. Support Nanping in deepening cooperation with Taiwan in the ecological, cultural, and tourism industries. Encourage Ningde to expand cooperation with Taiwan in new energy and marine aquaculture industries.

;

;;5. Deepen social and cultural exchanges between Fujian and Taiwan;

;

;(15) Expand social and cultural exchanges and cooperation. Support various non-governmental organizations in Fujian and Taiwan to carry out regular exchanges, and encourage qualified Taiwanese non-governmental organizations to set up offices in Fujian. Support Xiamen University and others in strengthening the construction of Taiwan-related research institutions and exchanges and cooperation with various think tanks in Taiwan. We will successfully organize major cross-Strait exchange activities such as the Straits Forum. Implement the Fujian and Taiwan history display and traceability project, and carry out activities such as connecting Fujian and Taiwan genealogies, tracing roots and paying homage to ancestors. Give full play to the role of Mazu and other folk beliefs as a spiritual bond, and carry out various forms of folk belief and custom exchange activities. Encourage Taiwanese religious circles and other social figures to come to Fujian for short-term study. Support exchanges and cooperation between Buddhism and Taoism in Fujian and Taiwan. Establish and improve the incentive mechanism for platform enterprises to promote cultural exchanges between Fujian and Taiwan.

;

;(16) Encourage young people to communicate and interact. Support youth groups in various fields and industries in Fujian and Taiwan to establish regular communication channels. Strengthen the construction of youth employment and entrepreneurship platforms across the Taiwan Strait and help Taiwanese youth come to Fujian to pursue, build and realize their dreams. Support primary and secondary schools in Fujian and Taiwan to strengthen inter-school exchanges and carry out cooperation in youth special sports such as baseball and softball. Use new media, popular culture, and the Internet to extensively carry out experiential, immersive, and interactive communication activities to continuously expand the common "circle of friends" and "circle of careers" shared by young people in Fujian and Taiwan.

;

;(17) Promote the integrated development of the cultural field. Encourage compatriots on both sides of the Taiwan Straits to jointly promote Chinese culture and promote the protection, inheritance, innovation and development of China’s excellent traditional culture. Create more cultural industry cooperation platforms and encourage Taiwanese cultural businesses to invest in them. Support cooperation projects between Fujian and Taiwan to be displayed to the outside world through overseas Chinese cultural centers. The pilot program allows Taiwanese businesses to invest in and establish radio and television program production and operation companies in Fujian. Guide the industries of Fujian and Taiwan to cooperate in producing high-quality films and televisions. Gather cultural and entertainment resources from both sides of the Taiwan Strait to create a cross-Strait pop culture center. Continue to carry out Taiwan-related cultural relic protection projects. Taiwanese compatriots are encouraged to apply for Fujian provincial-level representative inheritors of intangible cultural heritage. Support the Mazu palaces and temples in Fujian and Taiwan to jointly carry out the "Mazu Beliefs and Customs" protection action for the Representative List of Human Intangible Cultural Heritage, and share the results of protection. Promote the declaration of the red brick buildings and Mazu cultural and historical sites on both sides of the Taiwan Strait as world cultural heritage. Implement the "Research on the Origin and Diffusion of Austronesian Languages" project. Support Taiwanese companies in applying for cultural relics protection project qualifications, and Taiwanese professional institutions and personnel participate in archaeological projects in Fujian Province.

;

;;6. Strengthen organizational guarantees;

;

;(18) Uphold and strengthen the party’s overall leadership. Uphold the centralized and unified leadership of the Party Central Committee on Fujian's exploration of new paths for cross-Strait integrated development and the construction of cross-Strait integrated development demonstration zones, and implement the Party's leadership into all aspects of the work throughout the process.

;

;(19) Improve the work implementation mechanism. The Taiwan Affairs Office of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the National Development and Reform Commission should take the lead in coordination, make overall plans, establish dynamic optimization and improvement mechanisms, and promote policy implementation, evaluation and adjustment, summary and promotion, etc. Relevant departments of the central government and state agencies should propose innovative measures, strengthen policy support, and fully support Fujian in exploring new mechanisms, new paths, and new models for deepening cross-strait integrated development. Fujian Province should strengthen the main responsibilities, establish a coordinated implementation mechanism, give full play to the role of all parties, innovate working methods, and ensure that various measures are implemented and effective. Establish an expert committee for Fujian to explore new paths for cross-Strait integrated development, and conduct policy research on deepening the integrated development of Fujian and Taiwan.

;

;(20) Consolidate the foundation for legal protection. We will do a good job in promoting the legal protection of the construction of demonstration zones for cross-Strait integrated development. The various policies and measures proposed in this opinion, which involve adjusting the application of existing laws or administrative regulations, will be implemented after authorization by the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress or the State Council in accordance with legal procedures.

;

;(21) Provide financial support. The central government uses existing funding channels to support Fujian in carrying out Taiwan-related economic cooperation and cultural exchanges. Investment-related special projects within the central budget should increase support for major projects in Fujian exploring a new path for cross-strait integrated development.

;

;(Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, September 12)

;; Wed, 13 Sep 2023 06:26:05 +0800 01版要闻 - 深入扎实开展第二批主题教育http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/13/nw.D110000renmrb_20230913_7-01.htm
;2023年09月13日星期三

;“第一批主题教育已经告一段落，要抓好继续整改和建章立制工作，把主题教育探索的好经验好做法转化为长效机制。”习近平总书记近日在黑龙江考察时，对开展主题教育提出明确要求，强调“第二批主题教育已经启动，各地要坚持科学谋划、统筹安排、分类指导，确保取得实效”。

;

;根据党中央部署，第二批学习贯彻习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想主题教育在省以下各级机关及其直属单位和其他基层党组织开展，从今年9月开始，明年1月基本结束。第二批主题教育涉及的单位和人员范围广、类型多、数量大、任务重，要认真学习领会、贯彻落实习近平总书记重要指示精神，紧紧围绕“学思想、强党性、重实践、建新功”的总要求，牢牢把握深入学习贯彻习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想这一主题主线和根本任务，充分借鉴运用第一批主题教育成功经验，坚持学思用贯通、知信行统一，坚持同第一批主题教育衔接联动，坚持重点措施有机融合、一体推进，全面落实“以学铸魂、以学增智、以学正风、以学促干”的重要要求，确保实现凝心铸魂筑牢根本、锤炼品格强化忠诚、实干担当促进发展、践行宗旨为民造福、廉洁奉公树立新风的目标。

;

;深入扎实开展第二批主题教育，要把握正确政治方向，加强分级分类指导，突出问题导向，强化基层基础，注重开门搞教育，坚持严实作风。要突出抓好县处级以上领导班子和领导干部主题教育，把理论学习贯穿始终，用党的创新理论武装头脑、指导实践、推动工作；扎实开展调查研究，念好“深、实、细、准、效”五字诀，真正把调研成果转化为改进工作、推动发展的实际举措；全力推动高质量发展，把主题教育成果体现到高质量发展的成效上、体现到促进中心工作上；增强检视整改实效，深刻检视剖析、深挖思想根源、深入整改落实；搞好建章立制，把“当下改”与“长久立”结合起来，建立健全行得通、做得实、长期管用的制度机制。要采取务实管用、简便易行的措施抓实基层党组织主题教育，开展理论学习，引导党员、干部紧密联系岗位职责和工作要求，认真学习领会习近平总书记重要讲话精神；推动干事创业，引导党员、干部在推动发展、基层治理、服务群众中主动作为、担当有为；认真检视整改，基层党组织要围绕执行上级组织决定、严格组织生活、加强党员教育管理监督、联系服务群众、抓好自身建设等方面进行检视分析，找准查实问题短板，逐项整改到位。

;

;深入扎实开展第二批主题教育，离不开强有力的组织领导。各级党委（党组）要扛起抓主题教育的政治责任，行业系统主管部门要发挥好行业指导作用，加强领导指导，有力有序推进，确保第二批主题教育抓出质量、取得实效。要注重把准目标要求，把“学思想”作为首要任务贯穿始终；注重加强分类指导，针对不同层级、不同领域、不同对象，找准各自开展主题教育的着力点和发力点，增强针对性实效性；注重解决实际问题，善于抓住典型案例，通过“解剖一个问题”推动“解决一类问题”；注重抓好统筹衔接，主题教育从第一批转入第二批，必须坚持上下联动，防止前后割裂、批次脱节；注重防止形式主义、官僚主义，坚持一切从实际出发，多在实效上用功。

;

;这次主题教育是一件事关全局的大事。各地区各部门各单位要坚持围绕中心、服务大局，把开展主题教育同贯彻落实党中央各项决策部署结合起来，同推动本地区本部门本单位的中心工作结合起来，做到两手抓、两促进，推动党员、干部将焕发出来的学习、工作热情转化为攻坚克难、干事创业的强大动力。

;; Wed, 13 Sep 2023 06:26:05 +0800 02版要闻 - “中国共产党的故事——习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想在青海的实践”专题宣介会在西宁举行http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/13/nw.D110000renmrb_20230913_1-02.htm
;2023年09月13日星期三
; ;

;本报西宁9月12日电  （记者黄发红、乔栋）9月12日，由中共中央对外联络部和中共青海省委共同主办的“中国共产党的故事——习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想在青海的实践”专题宣介会在西宁举行。此次宣介会以“中国式现代化：人与自然和谐共生”为主题，通过青海省贯彻落实习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想特别是习近平生态文明思想的实践和成效，展现中国共产党带领中国人民全面推进中国式现代化的壮阔图景和为世界提供的新发展机遇。来自亚洲、非洲、欧洲、拉丁美洲、大洋洲近30个国家的150余名政党领导人或代表现场出席会议。

;

;中联部部长刘建超表示，中共十八大以来，以习近平同志为核心的党中央从中华民族永续发展的高度，本着对人类负责的态度，把生态文明建设摆在党和国家事业全局突出位置，带领中国人民开展了全球最大规模的生态保护行动，并在新时代生态文明建设伟大实践中，创造性地提出一系列新理念新思想新战略，形成并不断丰富和发展了习近平生态文明思想。“绿水青山就是金山银山”这一重要理念已经深深融入中国人的思维方式、生产方式和生活方式。中共二十大明确提出，人与自然和谐共生是中国式现代化的重要特征，强调中国将坚定不移走生产发展、生活富裕、生态良好的文明发展道路。中国共产党愿同各国政党和政治组织加强治国理政经验交流，共同推进人与自然和谐共生的现代化，共建地球生命共同体和清洁美丽世界。

;

;青海省委书记陈刚表示，中共十八大以来，习近平总书记两次考察青海，两次参加全国人大青海代表团审议，为青海提出了“三个最大”省情定位和“三个更加重要”战略地位，明确了打造生态文明高地和建设产业“四地”的高质量发展路径。青海牢记嘱托、感恩奋进，在推进青藏高原生态保护和高质量发展上不断取得新成就。青海正努力把青藏高原建设为习近平生态文明思想的实践高地，把国家公园打造为美丽中国的展示窗口，把清洁能源作为赢得未来的必然选择，为把地球建设成各国人民的美丽家园贡献青海力量。人与自然和谐共生已成为青海迈向中国式现代化最鲜明的标识。青海将继续用心守护好高原的生灵草木，让绿水青山永远成为青海的优势和骄傲。

;

;在故事分享环节，来自青海各地的普通党员和基层民众代表结合亲身感受，讲述了青海在保护环境、推动绿色发展、增进民生福祉等方面的感人故事。

;

;与会外宾高度评价以习近平同志为核心的中共中央带领中国人民在经济社会发展包括生态环保领域取得的巨大成就，表示通过参加专题宣介会和实地考察，见证了习近平生态文明思想引领中国发生的显著变化，增进了对中国式现代化的理解和认同。习近平总书记提出的“绿水青山就是金山银山”深刻揭示了经济发展和生态文明之间的有机联系，体现了习近平总书记作为大党大国领袖对中国和全世界的责任担当。在全球生态问题上，各国都无法独善其身，中国用自身生态文明建设的成就为其他国家树立了榜样。希同中国共产党加强交流往来，共同推动落实习近平总书记提出的三大全球倡议，促进生态环保等各领域合作，携手建设人类命运共同体。

;; Wed, 13 Sep 2023 06:26:05 +0800 02版要闻 - 西港特区，中柬务实合作的样板（共建“一带一路”·第一现场）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/13/nw.D110000renmrb_20230913_2-02.htm
;2023年09月13日星期三
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;西港特区内部航拍图。西港特区的总体规划面积为11.13平方公里，目前已开发6平方公里。

;
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;通用轮胎厂是西港特区最大投资项目，图为通用轮胎厂的一名车间质检员正在工作。
;以上图片均为亚太中心分社阿努摄

;
; ;

;早上不到7时，柬埔寨西哈努克省西哈努克市笼罩在一片细雨中。市中心尚行人稀少，十几公里外的西哈努克港经济特区（以下简称“西港特区”）大门外却已是车水马龙。正值上班早高峰，通往西港特区的道路上摩托车、汽车络绎不绝，各色雨衣形成了一道流动的风景。

;

;西港特区是中国批准的首批境外经贸合作区之一，是中柬两国政府间的国家级经济合作区。共建“一带一路”倡议提出10年来，西港特区快速发展，如今已有175家企业入驻，提供近3万个工作岗位。蓬勃发展的西港特区是中柬务实合作的样板，体现出共建“一带一路”的生机和活力。

;

;;“共建'一带一路'倡议提出后，西港特区的发展更快了”;

;

;西港特区道路宽阔整洁，厂房、办公楼、职工宿舍鳞次栉比，邻里中心、一站式服务中心、法律服务中心、卫生服务中心等配套设施一应俱全。很难想象，这里在2008年2月奠基前还一片荒芜，2008年10月才建成第一幢厂房。

;

;“共建'一带一路'倡议提出后，西港特区的发展更快了，现在入驻的企业数量比2013年增加了2倍以上。”西港特区公司董事长陈坚刚对记者说，“以前西港特区以轻工业企业为主，用电少，现在重工业企业增多了，为了保障用电，我们专门建设了自己的热电厂。”

;

;紧邻西港特区热电厂的，是通用轮胎科技（柬埔寨）有限公司的现代化生产车间。车间内硫化机、成型机轰鸣，工作人员将原材料放入成型机，不到40秒，一条20寸的轮胎就成型了。

;

;通用轮胎2022年入驻西港特区，厂区规划总用地面积近18万平方米。公司总经理陶国忠对记者说，工厂建成达产后，可年产500万条半钢胎和90万条全钢胎，预计可为当地创造1600个就业岗位。柬埔寨前劳动和职业培训部大臣毅森兴表示，通用轮胎项目投产后带动当地橡胶种植业发展，促进产业集群的形成，进一步推动当地就业和经济发展。

;

;西哈努克省濒临泰国湾，拥有柬埔寨最大的深水海港。主要生产节日装饰物和礼品的美国嘉富高（柬埔寨）有限公司2013年入驻西港特区。公司首席执行官拉玛尔告诉记者，西港特区靠近港口，物流运输十分便利，设施不断完善，给企业发展提供了良好环境。得益于西港特区的平台优势，该公司产量以每年10%的速度增长。

;

;2022年，西港特区企业进出口总额达24.93亿美元，约占柬埔寨全国贸易总额的4.8%。西港特区对西哈努克省的经济贡献率超过50%。“西哈努克省的发展离不开西港特区。”西哈努克省省长郭宗仁表示，蓬勃发展的西港特区已成为本地经济的支柱。

;

;靠近西港特区综合服务中心大楼的一座建筑内，共建“一带一路”倡议十周年西港特区成果展正在面向公众开放。展览以图片、视频、实物相结合的形式，全面呈现西港特区在中柬两国领导人及各级政府的合力支持下取得的累累硕果。今年5月，时任柬埔寨首相洪森在出席展览开幕式时表示：“西港特区的发展成果是柬中共建'一带一路'合作成果的重要组成部分。”

;

;;“人才支持与特区发展相结合的模式值得学习”;

;

;在西港特区的一角，坐落着西哈努克港工商学院。该学院由无锡商业职业技术学院和西港特区公司联合申办，2019年11月开始招生。

;

;二年级学生安娜来自柬埔寨茶胶省农村，高中毕业后她选择来西哈努克港工商学院深造。主修工商管理专业的同时，她选修了中文、英语、计算机等课程。因为中文进步很快，她已在西港特区找到一份中文翻译工作，如今月工资600多美元。

;

;“学校学费全免，为像我这样的贫困学生提供了很好的学习和工作机会。”安娜说，“我希望通过努力，毕业之后找到一份更好的工作，帮助家里改善生活。”

;

;“我们的学生掌握一定中文和技术后，月工资水平可以达到近400美元。毕业后，他们的月工资能达到600—800美元。”西哈努克港工商学院执行校长李传彬告诉记者，“西港特区的发展需要高素质人才，我们培养出来的学生很多都成了企业的管理骨干。”

;

;西港特区公司还与无锡商业职业技术学院共同资助培养柬埔寨留学生。阳光是土生土长的西哈努克省人，从无锡商业职业技术学院留学归国后，来到柬埔寨金港高速公路项目工作，目前管理着两个服务区。“以前家里一台摩托车都没有，我要走半小时路去上学。现在工资高了，我就买了一辆汽车。”阳光对未来的生活充满憧憬，“再攒一两年钱，就能盖新房子了！”

;

;同样位于西港特区的西哈努克省中柬友谊理工学院由中国政府援建，课程以技能培训为主，设有会计金融、信息技术、电力工程等多个专业，目前有1125名在读学生。学院技术培训办公室主任劳亨对记者说，之所以选择在西港特区办校，主要是为了给这里的企业输送人才，学校会根据企业需求提供短期或长期培训。“目前学校80%—90%的学生在特区企业工作，有些学生选择来学院上学，就是为了来西港特区工作。”

;

;柬埔寨国务大臣毕索坡恩说，在柬埔寨诸多工业园区中，只有西港特区设有培训中心，“人才支持与特区发展相结合的模式值得学习”。

;

;;“现在村子里人气越来越旺，大家的收入也多了起来”;

;

;波雷诺县默德朗乡布腾村毗邻西港特区。一走进村子，记者就看到了尼娅的小卖铺，门面宽敞，货架上整齐摆放着饮料、零食、调味品等。尼娅的老家在贡布省，她和丈夫来西哈努克省已有10多年。“以前，这里什么都缺，尤其是水和电。”她说，“西港特区建起来后，大家的生活条件越来越好。”

;

;刚来布腾村时，尼娅在一家鞋帽厂工作，丈夫卖咖啡。随着西港特区的发展，周边区域人口越来越多，夫妻俩从中看到了更多商机。尼娅的店面逐渐扩大，她的丈夫也在西港特区干起了建筑工程承包。“现在村子里人气越来越旺，大家的收入也多了起来。”尼娅说。

;

;沿着平坦的水泥路往前走，随处可见新建的楼房。70多岁的庞沙良正坐在自家院子里和邻居聊天，身后的两层楼房格外惹人注目。庞沙良告诉记者，这栋房子是2022年建成的，每层有10多个房间。因为看好布腾村邻近西港特区的优势，他专门在这里建楼房出租给西港特区工人，院子里的空地租给运输司机作停车位。

;

;据默德朗乡乡长弥占介绍，该乡近几年人口大幅增长，现在已有2000多户居民，人口超过7000人。“西港特区吸引了大量外来务工人员。村里这些小卖铺、服装店、药店、出租房，很多都是近几年建起来的。”他感叹道，“谁能想到，十几年前，布腾村还到处都是茅草棚子，荒僻得外人很少进来。”

;

;当地村民以前靠种地、打鱼为生，如今越来越多村民到西港特区工作，有了稳定的收入。培金在西港特区一家企业负责电力维修，入职7年已从一名普通员工成长为成熟的技工。如今，他把摩托车换成了小汽车，家里也建起了新房。他说：“以前，村里的路很窄，都是土路。现在大家日子过得越来越好，一切都不一样了。”

;

;“波雷诺县70%的家庭都有成员在西港特区工作。”弥占说，在西港特区的带动下，默德朗乡已经从贫困乡变成了波雷诺县最富裕的乡镇，几乎家家户户都有两三辆摩托车。

;

;西港特区建设深度融入西哈努克省乃至柬埔寨经济社会发展，成为中柬共建“一带一路”的生动实践。陈坚刚表示，未来西港特区将持续推进高质量发展，为构建中柬命运共同体作出更大贡献。

;本报符拉迪沃斯托克9月12日电  （记者隋鑫、肖新新）俄罗斯总统普京12日在符拉迪沃斯托克会见应邀出席第八届东方经济论坛的中共中央政治局委员、国务院副总理张国清。

;

;普京请张国清转达对习近平主席的诚挚问候，感谢中方派出高级别代表团来俄出席东方经济论坛。普京表示，在俄中双方的共同努力下，两国关系进入历史最好时期，经贸等各领域合作发展顺利，两国地方合作方兴未艾，远东开发成为俄中两国合作新的增长点，俄方对双边关系及各领域合作发展前景充满信心。

;

;张国清首先转达习近平主席对普京总统的亲切问候，对第八届东方经济论坛召开表示祝贺。张国清表示，两国元首为中俄关系发展定向把舵，中俄新时代全面战略协作伙伴关系保持高水平运行，各领域合作发展势头良好。今年3月习近平主席访俄取得丰硕成果。中方愿同俄方一道，落实两国元首重要共识，共享发展机遇，深化互利合作，加强区域发展战略协调对接，发挥两国地方合作机制作用，推动中俄合作持续向前发展，不断取得新成果。

;

;在俄罗斯期间，张国清出席第八届东方经济论坛全会，同俄罗斯副总理兼工业和贸易部部长曼图罗夫、滨海边疆区行政长官科热米亚科举行会见，考察由中资企业承建的双边合作项目。
